extendedInfo.description: Completely Offline and FREE app with 5000+ of best funny, cute and amazing Facebook Statuses for your fb wall posts, for all occasions. If you are looking for funny, witty, hilarious, crazy, silly status updates to shuffle & get likes and comments, your search ends in this app.Make your Facebook page & wall posts interesting every day with our latest and newest best Facebook statuses for all occasions. Try to share new facebook status or coolest quote every time as wall posts, to attract attention of your fb friends. Update new statuses creatively every day for your profile, for max likes. Stop searching websites for the coolest status quote, you can choose the best wall posts from our huge collection of awesome funny status quotes and share or update on fb.â Quotes & Statuses for Facebook - App Features:-More than 5000 of best clever, funny & witty text sayings, statuses and quotes for Facebook wall updates.-Share Statuses, Quotes and sayings for Facebook via SMS text messaging, Watsapp, Facebook, Twitter,etc.-This is one of the most used of useful apps at play store, provided FREE! Explore our flirty, interesting, cheerful, inspirational, casual, funny and creative FB status texts for fb likes and comments daily!Few of our 80+ categories of sayings, statuses and quotes for Facebook:â  Festival Quotes & Statuses â Merry Christmas texts, Xmas statuses for texting, Diwali, Eid Mubarak Status, Easter Updates, Holi, Rakhi( Sister's day), Ramdan fb textsâ  Languages Quotes & Statuses â English Facebook updates, Hindi shayari statuses, Islamic quotes, Love shayaris, Punjabi Facebook textsâ  Status Quotes Texts â Good Luck quotes, Funny Sayings, Emotional quotes, Motivational proverbs, Wise Sayings Statuses, Love poems & Life Sayings, Crush Quotes, Wisdom words, Quotes for girls and boysâ  Famous Day Quotes & Statuses â April Fools Statuses, Fathers day wishes, Friendship Day wishes, Independance day wishes, Mothers Day wishes, New Years Eve, Teacher's Day wishes, Valentines Day wishes, Thanks Giving msgsâ  Emotional Quotes & Statuses â Angry texts for fb, Break up texts, Condolence Messages, Cute Sweet statuses, Dirty adult texts, Decent good texts, Daring Insults, Sorry messages, Rude Selfish fb textsâ  Lovely Romantic Quotes & Statuses â Amazing Friends Status Texts, Broken Heart statuses, Flirty updates, I love you sayings, Creative Best fb updates, Kissing Quotes, Tender Love Words, Missing you love SMS, Naughty Romantic statuses, Sad love wordsâ  Greetings Quotes & Statuses â Anniversary greetings, Birthday SMS, Engagement updates, Wedding Wishes, Good morning Hellos, Good night messages, Good Morning SMS, Good Night quotes, Get well soon messagesâ  Funny Quotes & Statuses â Hilarious texts, Updates for kids & friends, Funny Facebook texts, Husband Wife Jokes, Crazy fb updatestags: free sms to india,free sms,160by2,ultoo,free message, free sms, way2sms, fullonsms, 160by2,way2sms free,sms limit 2013.
